author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Extended existing possibility to have electron tracking cut per detector region: added possibility to apply low-energy parametrization of a detector response for e+-  by this mechanism. By default this feature is not applied, so should be no regression in any WF. Some details are discussed in SIM meeting: https://indico.cern.ch/event/829622/contributions/3475747/attachments/1868386/3073294/VI20190625.pdf 

<!-- Please replace this text with a description of the feature proposed or problem addressed, what changes are expected in the output if any, what other PRs or externals it depends upon if any -->

#### PR validation:
Private runs and TB2006.

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: Updated code for tracking cut on e+-
